mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (name, email, password, phone, department, position, address_no, roadname_addr, detail_addr, img ) VALUES ( #{ name }, #{ email }, #{ password }, #{ phone }, #{ department }, #{ position }, #{ addressNo }, #{ roadnameAddr }, #{ detailAddr }, #{ img } )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member WHERE email = #{ email } AND password = #{ password } AND deleted = '0'
SELECT * FROM member WHERE email = #{ email }
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET password = #{ password } WHERE email = #{ email }
UPDATE member SET img = #{ img } WHERE email = #{ email }
UPDATE member SET deleted = 1 WHERE email = #{ email }
